history.proof: unfold Cminus, Cplus. qsimpl time: 1 use: RtoC_minus. qsimpl time: 1 use: RtoC_minus,Cplus_comm. qsimpl time: 1 use: RtoC_minus,RtoC_opp,Cplus_comm. qsimpl time: 1 use: RtoC_minus,RtoC_opp,Cplus_comm. qsimpl time: 1 use: RtoC_minus,RtoC_opp,Cplus_comm,Cplus_0_r. scongruence use: Rplus_opp_r unfold: RtoC, fst, C, snd.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of RtoC_minus (RtoC (_ - _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Cplus_comm (_ + _) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of RtoC_opp (RtoC (- _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Cplus_comm (_ + _) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Cplus_0_r (_ + 0) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment H5 : forall x : C, x + 0 = x H3 : forall x y : C, x + y = y + x H2 : forall x : R, (- x)%R = - x H : forall x y : R, (x - y)%R = x - y x : C Unable to unify "RtoC 0" with "((fst x + - fst x)%R, (snd x + - snd x)%R)".

original: unfold Cminus, Cplus. rewrite RtoC_minus. rewrite Cplus_comm. rewrite RtoC_opp. rewrite Cplus_comm. rewrite Cplus_0_r. reflexivity.
